1.2.name: wordpress/wp-image-preloader
1.2.description: WP Image Preloader, pre-loads images using Javascript. It uses an image preloader for jQuery (thanks to Matt Farina, http://www.mattfarina.com/). You can use it to preload hover images in your blog posts or in your wordpress themes, in menus slideshows etc. Find more about this plugin here: http://adrian.silimon.eu/wp-image-preloader/ .
